infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Just Hangin needs access to your location to show you on the map and allow you to create pins.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Just Hangin needs access to your location to show you on the map and allow you to create pins, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Just Hangin needs access to your location to show you on the map and allow you to create pins.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Just Hangin needs access to your camera to let you take profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Just Hangin needs access to your photos to let you choose profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Just Hangin to use your location.
